/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApRescBDao.selectApRescB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'LANG_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.LANG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) LANG_TYP_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.RESC_ID, T.LANG_TYP_CD, T.RESC_VA,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'LANG_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.LANG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) LANG_TYP_NM,
FROM AP_RESC_B T
AND T.RESC_ID = #{rescId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.RESC_ID, T.LANG_TYP_CD
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
